background_image_description: Full-bleed composite background. Left two-thirds features a portrait of a smiling young woman with long straight blonde hair wearing a green shirt, holding her right hand up making an OK gesture. The backdrop behind her is a soft pink (#f4a1b2) that blends into a bright yellow (#ffcc00) gradient toward the right side. Bottom half has a bold yellow overlay with a left-to-right halftone dot pattern in a slightly darker yellow/orange (#f7b500) fading toward the center-right. Near the lower-right area sits a wide black rounded-rectangle button and, to its immediate right, a small right-pointing black triangular arrow; the button itself is part of this background image (text will be overlaid).
